title: Cant reconnect into game
body:
I had a previous problem where my league client would bugsplat during a game, especially after the 1st game of the day/during. I finally fixed the problem, aaaadn whadya know? another problem appears.

Played 2 games today no problems, 1st i practice mode no probs. played a ranked - absolutely smashed it btw. No problems there. second game, smashing it hard. bamn game nearly ending, just couple turrets and a nexus. Computer just shuts down BSOD while backing. Quickly restarts, login, hit reconnect. 

Game is still in progress, but why am i not loading into the loading screen? then reconnect button appears again. I spam click it but wont get me in. Restart client in frustration multiple times to no avail. Can't reconnect at all...

y does the league client hate me?

replies.body:
Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

(Probs also make sure you're GPU drivers are up to date.)

If that doesn't work try reinstalling the game with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
